label: Import and Export
description: The market category for businesses and individuals involved in the import and export of goods and services.

subcategories.label: Importing Cars and Motorcycles
subcategories.description: Importing cars and motorcycles from other countries.

subcategories.label: Fair Trade Products
subcategories.description: Products that are certified as fair trade.

subcategories.label: Customs and Regulations
subcategories.description: Rules and regulations related to importing and exporting.

subcategories.label: Wholesale and Trade
subcategories.description: Buying and selling goods in bulk.

subcategories.label: Fair Trade Certification
subcategories.description: Certification for businesses that meet fair trade standards.

subcategories.label: Sourcing Agents
subcategories.description: Agents that help businesses source products from other countries.

subcategories.label: Duty Free Shopping
subcategories.description: Shopping for goods in duty-free stores.

subcategories.label: Shipping and Logistics
subcategories.description: Shipping and logistics services for importing and exporting.
